<js>
m=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchTopic');
n=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchInfo');
list = [];
for(i in m){
	con = {};
	con.n= String(m[i].select('.searchtitle').text())
	.replace(/《|》|txt.*/g,'')
	con.k = n[i].select('a').get(0).text();
	con.l = n[i].select('.oldDate').text();
	con.w = String(n[i].ownText()).replace(/.*大小：|日期.*/g,'');
	con.b = n[i].select('a').get(1).attr('href');
	list.push(con);
	}
list
</js>

exploreUrl.chapterList:
<js>
n=result.match(/第1页\/共(\d+)页/)[1];
var list=[];
var n = parseInt(n) ;
ul=java.getString('ul a.0@href');
ui=baseUrl.match(/(.*\/\/[^\/]+)\//)[1];

for(var i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	url=ui+String(ul).replace(/page=1/,"page="+i);
	me='第'+i+'页';
	list.push({"text":me,"href":url});
}
list
</js>

header.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明：根据序号设置书籍变量来切换源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+']'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'] \n使用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

header.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(result));
if(baseUrl.match(/\?keyword=/)){
if(result.book[0]==undefined){
sourl = source.getKey()+"/v1/lists.api?keyword="+java.get('key');
result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(sourl)).data;	
}
}	
result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
$.book[*]||$..lists[*]||$.[*]

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = 选择器 => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = 选择器 = > String(J.select('[property="og:' + 选择器 + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('小说:书名').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og( '小说:作者'),
	kind: og('小说:类别') + ',' + og('小说:状态').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	最新: og('小说:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推]. */g, '') + ' • ' + og('小说:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: ' 🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).* /, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book ;
</js>

exploreUrl.chapterList:
<js>
 //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true或false
 let obj = {showjname: false}
 let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
 let array = []
 $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
 	 java.put('jname',booklet.name)
 array.push({ 
 	 name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
 	 voltype:true
 	 })
 booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f8 1a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
 array.push({
 name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
 url: href,
 time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
 voltype:false
 })
 })
 })
 array
</js>
